main event: An observer in Kettering, Ohio spotted a blinking light that traveled and disappeared on the horizon on July 4, 1969.
interesting points: The observer noted the light pulsed at regular 2-second intervals,The object was described as being very bright and emitting no harmful glare to the observer's eyes,It appeared to move rapidly, changing directions and altitude several times during the sighting,At one point, the phenomenon extended a projection from its side that slowly retracted,The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes before the object gradually faded out and disappeared.
witness description: The observer was a resident of Kettering, Ohio.
